title: Mellow Mushroom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, International, Italian, Raw, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of hippie themed pizzeria chain with choices for vegans and vegetarians, including tofu, tempeh, and fresh veggie toppings for pizza plus large salads. About half the dishes are vegetarian and can be made vegan. Vegan crusts and Daiya cheese are available, along with many gluten free items.
